snippet: In a letter to Yahoo's board, the activist investor Daniel S. Loeb said that Yahoo's chief executive and a board member listed college majors different from the ones they earned. Read more »
abstract: In a letter to Yahoo's board, the activist investor Daniel S. Loeb said that Yahoo's chief executive and a board member listed college majors different from the ones they earned. Read more »

headline.main: DealBook: Loeb Accuses Yahoo Officials of Résumé Padding
